Body:
template = Template(
    """        <%def name="A()">
          ${caller.body()}
        </%def>

        <%def name="B()">
          ${caller.foo()}
        </%def>

        <%call expr="A()">
          <%call expr="B()">
            <%def name="foo()">
              foo
            </%def>
          </%call>
        </%call>

        """
    )
assert flatten_result(template.render()) == 'foo'
